name: Justin
persona_summary: Justin is a 31 year old asian man working as a software engineer at American Airlines in Dallas. He likes to watch movies and TV shows on the weekends, and he likes to travel to different countries occasionally.

session_1.text: I'm on vacation in Paris right now! Do you have any cafe recommendations?
